metadata.description: A collection of plugins for Claude Code.

plugins.name: dependabot
plugins.description: Commands to interact with Dependabot on GitHub repositories.

plugins.name: license
plugins.description: Commands to manage open source licenses in current repository

plugins.name: rubric
plugins.description: Automated code standards checks based on custom rubrics

plugins.name: chrome-devtools-mcp
plugins.description: UI testing and browser automation via Chrome DevTools MCP

plugins.name: worktree-manager
plugins.description: Git worktree management for parallel development

plugins.name: one-ui-migration
plugins.description: Angular 16 to 20 migration with DDD architecture

plugins.name: milo-core
plugins.description: Personal Claude Code settings, rules, docs, and agents

plugins.name: legacy-analyzer
plugins.description: Analyze legacy codebase and generate migration plan

plugins.name: continuous-learning
plugins.description: Extract and save reusable patterns from Claude Code sessions

plugins.name: guard
plugins.description: PreToolUse guards for safer Claude Code operations

plugins.name: session-memory
plugins.description: Persist and restore session context across Claude Code sessions
